input_text:
Technical Datasheet ELS NFC VOC — HVAC Ventilation Equipment

Multifunctional ventilator insert with VOC sensor and NFC configuration.
Article No.: 40764
Airflow: 7.5 – 100 m³/h in 14 stages
Factory settings: Stage 1: 35 m³/h, Stage 2: 60 m³/h, Stage 3: 100 m³/h
Sound pressure level (3m, DIN EN ISO 10140): Stage 1: 26 dB(A), Stage 2: 35 dB(A), Stage 3: 47 dB(A)
Protection class: IPX5
Safety class: II
Rated voltage: 230V AC, 50/60 Hz
VOC sensor: Threshold 100-450 VOC, Modes: Comfort/Intensive
Filter class: Coarse 50%
Connection: DN 100
Mounting: Tool-free slide-in mounting

issues: airflow_m3h as string instead of number
sound_level_dba as range string instead of max value

comparison_summary.recommendation: Claude Sonnet for production-critical extraction (higher reliability, better structure adherence). Llama-3.3-70B for fast pre-classification or non-critical batch processing at high volume.
comparison_summary.key_insight: The quality difference is especially significant with technical terminology and strict JSON schema compliance. For production use cases, reliability matters more than speed.
